- **assay**: Broadened the specific assay "CellTiter-Glo® 3D Cell Viability Assay" to the general category "3D microtissue viability"
- **tumorType**: Broadened the specific subtype "Epithelioid Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumor" to the broader term "Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumor"
